name: Micropub endpoint
description: A micropub endpoint for a GitHub Pages site.

SITEURL.description: The GitHub Pages Jekyll site URL. For example: "https://muan.github.io/micropub-content".

GITHUB_REPOSITORY.description: The GitHub repository name for your Jekyll site. For example: "muan/micropub-content".

DEFAULT_BRANCH.description: The GitHub Pages branch for your Jekyll site.
